sentences.english: China Association for Promoting Democracy focuses on political participation and institution building, to strengthen the special committee work.
sentences.chinese: 民進注重參政議政制度建設，加強專門委員會工作。

sentences.english: Representative politics here hasn't always represented female freedoms.
sentences.chinese: 代議政治並非總是代表女性的自由。

sentences.english: It is not a rare thing in China that the people participates the management of country affairs.
sentences.chinese: 老百姓參政議政在中國已經不再是稀罕的事情了。

sentences.english: Religious personages enjoy full rights to participate in the deliberation and administration of state affairs.
sentences.chinese: 宗教界人士享有充分的參政議政權利。

definition: to offer advice/to make a suggestion
bring order out of chaos/set to rights things which have been thrown into disorder
to take turns/to work by roster
to be involved in politics/participation in politics
(Tw) to draw on (others' experience)/to learn from (how others do things)/lesson to be learned (by observing others)
to judge the hour and size up the situation/to take stock
